snippet.title: The Tale of LUMI Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the DEMO now 👉 https://discord.gg/GFNhTxNRb7

The Tale of LUMI is a 2D metroidvania-style action game.

You play as Atlas on his quest to restore the ruined kingdom of LUMI.

Collect DIVINE POWERUPS, fight POWERFUL enemies, solve INTRIGUING puzzles, master PLATFORMING, UPGRADE your arsenal and EXPLORE the ruined kingdom of LUMI!
